title: Unsewing Machine, The, La Machine Decoudre Patrcia Barzyk, Pierre Semmier, Sophie Moyse, Isabelle Strawa, Sophie Vanacker, Sylvie Mouttet + Jean Pierre Mocky

sources.title: Unsewing Machine, The, La Machine Decoudre Patrcia Barzyk, Pierre Semmier, Sophie Moyse, Isabelle Strawa, Sophie Vanacker, Sylvie Mouttet + Jean Pierre Mocky
sources.description: An MKV version of Jean-Pierre Mocky's The Unsewing Machine (La Machine a Decoudre). Apparently the funding for this epic did not include wardrobes for the female cast. The plot apparently has something to do with a doctor trying to raise money for a clinic for blind children.
